item.title: 美股在英伟达发布财报前上涨，止住四日跌势
item.description: 由于人工智能风向标英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）在收盘后发布财报前上涨，美国股市周三走高，止住了自 8 月份以来的最长连跌走势。【原文：US stocks edged higher on Wednesday, halting their longest losing streak since August, as AI bellwether Nvidia Corp. rose ahead of its earnings report after the closing bell.】

item.title: 评级下调，海普威达股价跌至历史最低点附近
item.description: Hapvida Participações e Investimentos SA 的股价在纪录低点附近徘徊，因为上周的盈利不佳引发了对这家巴西医疗保健运营商的降级潮。【原文：Shares in Hapvida Participações e Investimentos SA are hovering near record lows after an earnings miss last week sparked a wave of downgrades for the Brazilian health care operator.】

item.title: 美国警告南非不要在峰会上发表二十国集团声明
item.description: 根据彭博社看到的一份文件，美国正式警告南非不要在本周末约翰内斯堡 20 国集团峰会上推动发表联合声明，特朗普政府将抵制该声明。【原文：The US formally warned South Africa against pushing for a joint statement at this weekend’s Group of 20 summit in Johannesburg that the Trump administration is boycotting, according to a document seen by Bloomberg.】

item.title: 贝莱德 1,850 亿美元模型在科技股崩盘之际提升股票押注
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc. ）正在其价值1850亿美元的模型投资组合平台上增加对美国股票的投资，而此时投资者正在质疑今年由人工智能推动的涨势的持久力。【原文：BlackRock Inc. is boosting its exposure to US equities across its $185 billion model-portfolio platform at a time when investors are questioning the staying power of this year’s artificial intelligence-fueled rally.】

item.title: 人工智能初创企业 Firebird 获美国批准在亚美尼亚数据中心使用英伟达芯片
item.description: 人工智能初创公司 Firebird Inc. 已获得美国政府批准，向亚美尼亚出口英伟达公司的芯片，用于该国的一个超级计算机项目，这是全球推动扩大人工智能基础设施的一部分。【原文：The AI startup Firebird Inc. has received US government approval to export Nvidia Corp. chips to Armenia for a supercomputer project in the country, part of a global push to expand artificial intelligence infrastructure.】

item.title: 关税生效后美国 8 月贸易逆差收窄
item.description: 周三的官方数据显示，美国贸易赤字在 8 月份有所缩减，原因是美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的一系列全球关税税率开始生效，而此前由于政府停摆而出现了长时间的延迟。【原文：The US trade deficit shrank in August as a slew of global tariff rates from President Donald Trump kicked in, official data showed Wednesday after a lengthy delay due to a government shutdown.】

item.title: 迪拜航展为空客与波音的竞争带来逆转和反击
item.description: 在今年的迪拜航展上，空中客车公司（Airbus SE）和波音公司（Boeing Co.【原文：This year’s air show in Dubai featured an unusual array of upsets, surprises and comebacks as Airbus SE and Boeing Co. fought over orders, while a new contender from China made its presence felt to challenge the long-standing duopoly.】

item.title: 诺和诺德裁员使丹麦有望成为 2020 年以来裁员最多的国家
item.description: 随着制药巨头诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）大刀阔斧地裁员，全国裁员人数激增，丹麦将迎来自科维德病毒大流行以来最严重的失业年。【原文：Denmark is heading for its worst year of job losses since the Covid pandemic, as sweeping cuts at pharmaceutical giant Novo Nordisk A/S drive a surge in redundancies across the country.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 16 岁以下青少年禁令临近，Meta 警告合规错误
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司警告说，在下个月准备遵守澳大利亚全球首个针对 16 岁以下青少年的社交媒体禁令时，识别和删除未成年用户将面临巨大困难。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. warned of significant difficulties identifying and removing underage users as it prepares to comply with Australia’s world-first social media ban for under-16s next month.】

item.title: 斯塔默称英国预算将 "基于工党价值观
item.description: 英国首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）表示，下周公布的英国预算将 "基于工党的价值观"，因为人们猜测财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）将不得不针对富人增税。【原文：Prime Minister Keir Starmer said the UK budget announced next week would be “based on Labour values,” as speculation builds that Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves will have to target the wealthy with tax hikes.】

item.title: 欧盟建议简化数字规则以提高竞争力
item.description: 欧盟公布了一项减少数字监管的全面计划，该计划旨在提高欧盟在人工智能领域的竞争力，并为本地科技公司提供帮助。【原文：The European Union unveiled a sweeping plan to reduce digital regulation as the bloc strives to boost its competitiveness in artificial intelligence and aid local technology companies.】

item.title: Adobe 将以 19 亿美元收购营销平台 Semrush
item.description: Adobe 公司已同意以 19 亿美元的价格收购营销软件公司 Semrush Holdings Inc.，这是该公司自 2022 年以 200 亿美元收购 Figma Inc.【原文：Adobe Inc. has agreed to buy the marketing software company Semrush Holdings Inc. for $1.9 billion, marking its first takeover announcement since the failed $20 billion acquisition of Figma Inc. in 2022.】

item.title: 育碧推迟发布财报，周五恢复交易
item.description: 育碧娱乐公司（Ubisoft Entertainment SA）表示，该公司将在周五开盘前发布上半年财报，上周该公司在原定发布日意外推迟了财报发布时间。【原文：Ubisoft Entertainment SA said that it will release its results for the fiscal first half before trading opens on Friday, after unexpectedly postponing their publication on the scheduled release day last week.】

item.title: 拉里-萨默斯因与爱泼斯坦的关系退出 OpenAI 董事会
item.description: 拉里-萨默斯（Larry Summers）将离开 OpenAI 董事会，这是他在美国立法者公布这位美国前财政部长与已故不光彩的性犯罪者杰弗里-爱泼斯坦（Jeffrey Epstein）的通信后离开公共职位的一部分。【原文：Larry Summers will leave the board of OpenAI, part of his departure from public roles after US lawmakers released the former US Treasury Secretary’s correspondence with the late disgraced sex offender Jeffrey Epstein.】

item.title: 迈阿密海滩海滨大道吸引开发商，他打赌自己能让它重现生机
item.description: 零售业开发商迈克尔-科姆拉斯（Michael Comras）在迈阿密海滩林肯路下了新的赌注，十年前，他在这条著名的海滨大道上的大部分投资组合都已售出，现在他又买下了一组建筑。【原文：Retail developer Michael Comras is making a fresh bet on Miami Beach’s Lincoln Road, scooping up a cluster of buildings a decade after unloading much of his portfolio on the famed promenade.】

item.title: 日本最大核电站距离重启裁决越来越近
item.description: 这在很大程度上取决于当地的政治家，他将决定是否启动柏崎刈羽设施。【原文：Much rests on the shoulders of the local politician who’s deciding whether to crank up the Kashiwazaki Kariwa facility.】

item.title: 新加坡称美国应为和平与繁荣发挥作用
item.description: 新加坡总理黄永宏说，美国在全球和平与稳定中发挥了关键作用，尽管唐纳德-特朗普总统奉行美国优先的精神，但美国在未来仍有潜力发挥这一作用。【原文：The US has played a critical role in global peace and stability, and has the potential to play that role in the future despite the America First ethos pursued by President Donald Trump, said Singapore Prime Minister Lawrence Wong.】

item.title: PHP 启动价值 7.5 亿英镑的英国私立医院股权出售项目
item.description: 初级保健地产公司（Primary Health Properties Plc）已经启动了为价值 7.5 亿英镑（约合 9.84 亿美元）的私立医院投资组合寻找风险合作伙伴的程序，因为该公司在与 Assura Plc 合并后寻求降低杠杆率。【原文：Primary Health Properties Plc has kicked off a process to find a venture partner for a £750 million ($984 million) portfolio of private hospitals as it seeks to reduce leverage following its merger with Assura Plc.】

item.title: 阿布扎比基金在加密货币暴跌前数月将比特币赌注增加三倍
item.description: 阿布扎比投资委员会在第三季度将其在比特币交易所交易基金中的持仓规模扩大了两倍多，就在加密货币的牛市让位于惨烈的抛售前不久。【原文：The Abu Dhabi Investment Council more than tripled the size of its position in a Bitcoin exchange-traded fund during the third quarter, shortly before the bull market in cryptocurrencies gave way to a brutal selloff.】

item.title: 新兴市场股市下滑，交易员权衡人工智能反弹前景
item.description: 在英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）周三晚些时候公布财报之前，新兴市场股市下滑，这是对大型科技公司的一次关键考验，可能为股市进入新年奠定基调。【原文：Emerging-market stocks slipped ahead of Nvidia Corp.’s earnings later on Wednesday, a key test for big tech that could set the tone for the equities into the New Year.】

item.title: 在人工智能问题上缺乏答案的欧洲是一致的
item.description: 欢迎收看《深度科技》（Tech In Depth），这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日通讯。今天，克里斯蒂娜-基里亚索格洛（Christina Kyriasoglou）将从柏林举行的一次科技峰会上为您带来报道，在这次峰会上，欧洲在人工智能发展竞赛中的现实地位已昭然若揭。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Christina Kyriasoglou reports from a tech summit in Berlin where the reality of Europe’s place in the race to develop AI was made painfully clear.】

item.title: 在亚洲世纪到来之际，特朗普扭转局势的长期努力
item.description: 美国总统希望重新点燃 1900 年代被称为 "美国世纪 "的那种经济霸主地位，但这有可能使美国孤立于声称拥有 2000 年代的亚洲地区。【原文：The president’s bid to rekindle the kind of economic supremacy that saw the 1900s dubbed “America’s Century” risks isolating it from the region that’s laying claim to the 2000s — Asia.】

item.title: 美国港口在关税前装货的影响下年末增长放缓
item.description: 集装箱港口处于特朗普贸易战的前线【原文：Container ports are on the front lines of Trump’s trade wars】

item.title: 借贷成本上升，美国抵押贷款活动减少
item.description: 由于房屋融资成本持续走高，美国上周的抵押贷款活动有所减少，这进一步证明了房地产市场仍在苦苦挣扎。【原文：US mortgage activity declined last week as home-financing costs continued to tick higher, adding to evidence of a struggling housing market.】

item.title: 特朗普的军舰引发委内瑞拉违约债券反弹
item.description: 当美国总统唐纳德-特朗普在委内瑞拉海岸线上训练海军舰炮时，关于政权更迭的言论在加拉加斯和华尔街甚嚣尘上，在华尔街，投机者正在竞相抬高该国违约债券的价格。【原文：As US President Donald Trump trains naval guns on the Venezuelan coastline, talk of regime change swirls in Caracas — and on Wall Street, where speculators are bidding up prices on the country’s defaulted bonds.】

item.title: 伦敦最富裕街区房价暴跌
item.description: 肯辛顿和切尔西的房价在截至9月份的一年中下跌了近16万英镑（21万美元），因为工党政府下周的预算案中预计要增加税收，这让首都的住房市场感到非常不安。【原文：House prices in Kensington and Chelsea fell by almost £160,000 ($210,000) in the year to September, as the capital’s housing market reels from expected tax hikes in the Labour government budget next week.】

item.title: 摩根大通的超大支票让所有其他贷款人望尘莫及
item.description: 对于银行和私人信贷之间的地盘争夺战，摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：For all the talk of a turf war between banks and private credit, JPMorgan Chase & Co. is dominating on the field — with giant checks that only the biggest US bank can write.】

item.title: Stellantis 主要供应商即将达成涉及资产出售的债务交易
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Stellantis NV 公司的一家重要供应商即将与贷款人达成债务重组协议。【原文：A key supplier of Stellantis NV is nearing an agreement with its lenders to restructure its liabilities, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 诺基亚精简业务，专注于人工智能基础设施的蓬勃发展
item.description: 诺基亚公司（Nokia Oyj）寄希望于人工智能的蓬勃发展，精简业务，专注于能够连接人工智能数据中心的网络基础设施。【原文：Nokia Oyj is banking on the boom in artificial intelligence, streamlining its business to focus on networking infrastructure that can connect AI data centers.】

item.title: 企业开始热衷于说人工智能是裁员的原因
item.description: 9 月底，德国汉莎航空公司（Deutsche Lufthansa AG）告诉分析师和投资者，该公司计划在本十年末裁撤 4000 个行政职位。该公司提出的原因之一是 "人工智能的使用越来越多"。【原文：In late September, the German airline Deutsche Lufthansa AG told analysts and investors that it planned to eliminate 4,000 administrative positions by the end of the decade. Among the reasons it cited was “the increased use of artificial intelligence.”】
